page.title: 09OLD HALL
page.content: This{mixed farm}specialises in{ {dairy farming.}It consists of{150 {acres}of which{120 acres are grass.}On this,{110 dairy cows}and{180 sheep {graze.}There are 30 acres of barley which is all used but extra is bought in. The owners of the farm go to {Oswestry market}twice a month but they don't like it because they think it is hard on the animals. They sell through direct sales. The dairy cows that they keep produce{14,000 litres of milk}a week. This milk goes to the{dairy at {Ellesmere.}The cows are milked twice a day at 7a.m. and 5p.m. They are fed on{silage and barley}in the winter and they graze on the grass in summer. On the farm they have{3 tractors, {trailers, a combine harvester, a {bailer and a manure spreader.
